name: Inbetween Land
description: Open the portal to a strange world and save your friend with Inbetween Land, a stunning sci-fi adventure. There's a sense that something just isn't right when a childhood friend calls for you.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista®, Windows® 7, Windows® 8 Processor: 1GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce MX440 or higher Storage: 530 MB available space Sound Card: Is not essential
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista®, Windows® 7, Windows® 8 Processor: 1.5Ghz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce MX440 or higher Storage: 700 MB available space Sound Card: Is not essential

reviews.review_text: This one I brought as part of a bundle, not really in hidden object games but thankfully there ended up only being about 5 HO scenes in the whole game. The rest of the game is more like a FP adventure game.   The art and the story I liked and the voice acting in surprisingly decent.
Excellent game with heaps of puzzles. Set the game to have 'NO SKIP' that way you have to do puzzles.
